txt.en:
'Battles were once fought in these lands among great Men, [placeholder], and relics from the swords of the dead fell to the earth. In most places, the gems have long since been picked up by greedy fingers, but the pools of the Dunbog have been known to be rich with glinting treasures, lost in the deep mud.

'If you go to the Dunbog at night and try your hand at fishing there, you may pull up many great treasures that will improve your gear.'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: You must have the fishing hobby trained in order to complete this quest.</rgb>

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This is a solo quest and cannot be completed in a fellowship.</rgb>
'You were a great help to the peoples of Dunland, [placeholder]! Please, choose a reward as a token of Galtrev's gratitude.'

'Are you ready to travel to the Dunbog, [placeholder]?'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: You must have the fishing hobby trained in order to complete this quest.</rgb>

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This is a solo quest and cannot be completed in a fellowship.</rgb>

Many valuable relics of old were lost in a battle that took place long ago in the Dunbog. It is often said that night-time fishing excursions will produce ancient and wonderful gems that enhance powerful items.
Talk to Bron to travel to the Dunbog

Bron is in Galtrev.

You should speak with Bron to begin your fishing expedition in the Dunbog.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: You must have the fishing hobby trained in order to complete this quest.</rgb>

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This is a solo quest and cannot be completed in a fellowship.</rgb>
Bron is in Galtrev at the milestone marker in the centre of town.\n\nYou should speak with Bron to collect your reward.
